current.sotm_description: The rose is considered a classic symbol of purity and beauty, long cherished for its romantic bloom and elegant aroma. Giving the gift of a rose is a centuries old tradition that we find rings true, considering this flower offers many unique gifts of its own. We choose to utilize rose in our skincare and cosmetics because of its wondrous and varied remedies for the skin: undiluted hydrosol hydrates, tones, and balances, while rose hip oil delivers skin rejuvenating vitamins and antioxidants. We love rose for its pure and potent benefits, and know your skin will too.
current.iotm_description: Technically considered a large berry with a single giant seed, the avocado is as beneficial for skin as it is unique. This leathery green fruit (also called ‘alligator pear’) is known for its creamy texture and flavorful meat, but its benefits aren’t only for taste; hydration, moisturization, and protective antioxidants can all be found in avocados. We use avocado butter, oil, and seed oil in our skincare and cosmetics to instill non-clogging, soothing nourishment and repairing vitamins into your skin.
current.sotm_content: Native to South America, we love Acerola cherry because it is extremely rich in  vitamin c & carotenoids which provide the skin with antioxidants
current.iotm_body: Native to South America, we love Acerola cherry because it is extremely rich in vitamin C & carotenoids which provide the skin with antioxidants.
current.iotm_content:
Highly coveted because of its age-defying qualities, collagen is the component in the skin that keeps it smooth, elastic, and youthful. Skincare products can’t actually increase collagen in the skin, but certain ingredients can help to encourage the body’s own ability to produce it. One of these powerful ingredients is seaweed.

An anomaly of the plant kingdom, seaweed regenerates itself at an astounding rate of two feet per day. It isn’t surprising, then, that when concentrated and used in our serums, shampoos, masks, and moisturizers, seaweed collagen becomes a powerful catalyst for skin renewal.
current.ingredient-of-the-month-content: Native to South America, we love Acerola cherry because it is extremely rich in Vitamin C & carotenoids which provide the skin with antioxidants.

settings.eventDetail:
Switch to Clean Beauty Event
Bring in your toxic, not cruelty-free makeup products, and receive 50% off a clean, natural, color-matched version of that makeup product! (Limit of 3 discounted products per customer)

settings.title: BOGO Bonanza
settings.content: Buy 2 full-priced product, get 1 product of equal or lesser value free with code B2G1. Buy 3 full-priced product, get 2 products of equal or lesser value free with code B3G2. Buy 4 full-priced products, get 4 products of equal or lesser value free with code B4G4. Valid on last call products. Excludes gift sets and gift cards. Available in US and CA. No returns or exchanges. No rain-checks. No reservations. Not applicable towards previous purchases. Supplies vary per store. If qualifying purchases are returned, free product(s) must also be returned or purchased at full retail price. Valid through 8/15/2021 11:59 PM PST.

settings.title: Mystery Bundle Box
settings.content: Valid online only. Available in US and CA. Free US Standard Shipping only. Final sale. No returns or exchanges. While supplies last. No rain-checks. No reservations. Not applicable towards previous purchases. Valid through 8/31/2021 11:59 PM PST.

settings.title: Free Shipping US Standard Only
settings.content: Valid online only. No minimum order. Free shipping applies to US domestic standard shipping only. Valid through 8/6/2021 11:59PM PST.

settings.title: In-Stores Only: Marula & Rosehip Oil Launch Store Event
settings.content: Offer valid in-stores only. With purchase of any of the new Rosehip or Marula Oil products, receive a 20% discount on full priced products. Supplies vary per store. Offer cannot be combined with any other discount code, including  Purist Pro. Offer not valid on gift sets and gift cards. Offer not valid on previous purchases. While supplies last. No reservations. No rain-checks. Offer valid through 8/5/2021 to 8/8/2021.

settings.title: In-Stores: Semi-Annual Sale: Cosmetics
settings.content: Valid in-stores only. While supplies last. Supplies availability vary per store location. Offer valid on full-priced cosmetic products only. No returns or exchanges. No rain-checks. No reservations. Not applicable towards previous purchases. Offer valid through 7/10/2021 11:59 PM PST.

settings.title: Online Only: Semi-Annual Sale: Cosmetics
settings.content: While supplies last. Discount is automatically applied to cart. Offer valid on select products only. Available in US, CA, and EU. No returns or exchanges. No rain-checks. No reservations. Not applicable towards previous purchases. Offer cannot be combined with any other discount code including Purist Perks, Purist Pro. Offer valid through 7/10/2021 11:59 PM PST.

settings.title: Denver Grand Opening Promotion
settings.content: Offer valid at Denver location only. Buy 2 items, get 15% off. Buy 3 items, get 20% off. Offer valid on full-priced merchandise, gift sets and last call. Offer not valid on gift cards. Offer cannot be combined with any other discount code including Purist Perks, Purist Pro. While supplies last. Offer not valid on previous purchases. No reservations. No rain-checks.

settings.title: Last Call Sale
settings.content: While supplies last. Discount is automatically applied in cart. Offer valid on select products only. Available in US, CA, and EU. No returns or exchanges. No rain-checks. No reservations. Not applicable towards previous purchases. Supplies vary per store.

settings.title: Subscribe & Save
settings.content: Subscribe and save program valid on select products only. Must add product to cart as an auto-replenish subscription product. Available for US customers only. Free US Domestic Standard Shipping only. While supplies last. If a product is unavailable during the subscription period, the subscription charge will pause until the product is available. Individual products cannot be combined with other discounts, including Purist Perks or Purist Pro. Offer not valid on previous purchases. No reservations. No rain-checks. Subscription can be cancelled at any time.
